alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 12:53PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Developing strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Kenedy County through 115 PM CDT... At 1251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riviera Beach, or 10 miles east of Sarita, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kenedy County Wind Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
